attributes.action: Show compassion, dismiss the  Tania Clarence murder charge
attributes.additional_details:
The agony of the physical and emotional exhaustion most parents undergo in caring and loving children with a severe degenerative life-limiting condition is for many
ordinary people beyond endurance. Tania Clarence had not one, but three very disabled children, and she is charged with killing them- we suspect, because she had reached the end of her tether.   Please release her to psychiatric support.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police and the justice system.
